name: Point to No Returns
description:
Point to No Returns is an educational game teaching valuable lessons in business marketing.
Playing the role of a supermarket franchisee, you must ensure the maximum number of customers are walking out with your products.
You must not take no for an answer.
Remember when in doubt, Point to No Returns!

Made for Timdred Jam. All assets except for audio were created from scratch:

  •  Up In My Jam (All Of A Sudden) - Kubbi
  • SOUND EFFECTS PACK!
  • SOUND EFFECTS PACK! (#3)
